    • Field Detail

      • PARAM_PAGING_MESSAGE_KEY_SUFFIX

        static final String PARAM_PAGING_MESSAGE_KEY_SUFFIX
        request parameter identifying a message key suffix (appended to 'widget.paging.tooltip.') which used to generate a tooltip message for the paging navigation. In case the parameter is not found in the request the message key is created by evaluating the return value of getDefaultPagingMessageKeySuffix().
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PAGING_MASSAGE_KEY_PREFIX

        static final String PAGING_MASSAGE_KEY_PREFIX
        Prefix for the paging tooltip message key (widget.paging.tooltip.).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultPagingMessageKeySuffix

        String getDefaultPagingMessageKeySuffix()
        Returns the default message key suffix for creating a tooltip to the paging navigation. This value is evaluated if the PARAM_PAGING_MESSAGE_KEY_SUFFIX is not in the request.
        Returns:
        the message key suffix

      • getPageInformation

        PageInformation getPageInformation()
        Get the page information of the widget
        Returns:
        the page information

      • getParameterDescriptions

        Map<String,String> getParameterDescriptions()
        Get the parameter descriptions: This is a map of the parameter names to a human understanable value, e.g. the full name of the user or the name of a user group. Only the parameter names are set which have been used in the filter. The name can be determined by #getSuppliedParameters()
        Returns:
        the parameter descriptions
